projects.name: Xrossfit
projects.description: A MERN Stack Application for users to keep a log of their daily exercises, buy training equipment and payment with additional functionalities such as user Authentication, payment gateway, admin portal and exercise recommendation.

projects.name: Plateformer Game
projects.description: This project is a 2D platformer game built using the Pygame library in Python. It includes a player character that can run, jump, and double jump while avoiding obstacles and enemies, and collecting coins

projects.name: Password Checker
projects.stack: Python3, Have I Been Pwned API, Flask
projects.description: This Flask application lets the user securely check if a password has been pwned or hacked without transmitting the password through theinternet. It uses Troy Hunt’s Have I Been Pwned API to get the passwords that have been leaked in the past using only the first five characters ofthe SHA1‑generated password.

projects.name: Notes Keeper App
